content:
This application is my diploma project.

	The main task of this project is:
	- providing secure access to the application using fingerprint authentication and authorization with a timeout triggering in 1 minute.
	- providing the user with the ability to translate text from one language to another
	- the ability to recognize text using an image obtained from the camera or from an image in the gallery
	- this application uses a NoSQL database to store user data in encrypted form
	- the application allows you to generate QR codes and send them as an image, for example, in the Telegram messenger
	- the application also allows you to scan QR codes with translated text and display it on another smartphone.
	- also, the text is voiced when you click on the text-to-speech button (speaker) and speaks with the accent of the native speaker of the translation

	If you liked the app, please rate the app in the Play Market.
creator: Maksim Syramalotau
